ai-tha-ap186:1.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap186:2.1_0: and on the fifth day funeral pyre.
ai-tha-ap186:2.2_0: I’ve set it out for the four months.
ai-tha-ap186:3.2_0: if he is on the highway;
ai-tha-ap186:4.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap186:4.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap186:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap186:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable View.
